document_data.mainbody:
Lord Consul Povalo Lurian was a noble of House Lurian in the city of Procampur in the Vast in the late 14 century DR.
As head of House Lurian, he was involved in the familys gold-smithing business.
His wife was High Lady Jasmine Lurian and they had some children.While several other members of House Lurian are known, their relationships are unknown, though some are most likely intended to be the children of Povalo and Jasmine.
He was head of the family by 1370 DR, when he was aged 55.
